name: Forester
description:
Be careful going about your business in the forest, at any moment you may be attacked by a wild beast. Engage in agriculture, complete the tasks assigned to you, move forward, further - more interesting

Forester - 3D action game with elements of time management and survival. You have to perform the routine work of a forester, whose duties include maintaining order in the forest. Have time to feed the animals, harvest and heat the house so that the fragile balance of nature is not destroyed. The most important thing is to build the most optimal route between tasks, because each of them has its own timer.

Complete the tasks assigned to you, move on, and then something interesting may be waiting for you, but what? Of course, you will see for yourself. The game can be played by both an adult and a child, everyone will like it. If you want to relax after a hard day's work, or just take a break from other games - you can safely run this game.


Features of the game:
- Open world
- Soothing music
- Freedom of action
- Relaxing game
- The game can be played by both adults and children
- Relaxing music
- Suitable for people of all ages
